short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage frequently used prompts with advanced features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prompt Manager Pro allows users to save, search, and manage their frequently used prompts with ease. 
Key features include:
- Save prompts with one click.
- Copy and delete prompts directly from the interface.
- Use advanced search functionality.
- Organize prompts into categories.
- Font size adjustment for better readability.
